TEXT: A mutant hunter who continues to endure. NL Keeps his distance while catching foes off guard with traps and explosives.
NL You prepare a piercing shot!

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~mutant,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
